<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file implements the &quot;backend&quot; phase of LTO, i.e. it performs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimization and code generation on a loaded module. It is generally used</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to implement a standalone ThinLTO backend.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Runs a ThinLTO backend.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If \\p ModuleMap is not nullptr, all the module files to be imported have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// already been mapped to memory and the corresponding BitcodeModule objects</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// are saved in the ModuleMap. If \\p ModuleMap is nullptr, module files will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// be mapped to memory on demand and at any given time during importing, only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// one source module will be kept open at the most. If \\p CodeGenOnly is true,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the backend will skip optimization and only perform code generation. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p IRAddStream is not nullptr, it will be called just before code generation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to serialize the optimized IR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343a902b0d55fddef6f8d651fe1035b7d4bd">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/lto/#ae6ff75e89240b2f2c01d3be088ca6014">thinBackend</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config">Config</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Task, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aeb8b31be7b2c7dd67496051d7f952e94">AddStreamFn</a> AddStream,</span></CodeLine>
